name: Qanoniah Holdings Limited
description: Operator of a legal platform intended to offer legal search engine services. The company's platform facilitates access, understanding and dealing with Saudi legal documents with the click of a button and also provides support services to legal professionals by providing a qualitative database that includes more than sixty thousand documents and legal documents related to the Saudi system, enabling companies to find, understand and manage accurate up-to-date legal content in seconds.
one_liner: Operator of a legal platform intended to offer legal search engine services.
